subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Ben Roethlisberger said he believed he could return this season despite spraining his right shoulder and sustaining what he called a dislocated rib in Monday night’s overtime win against Kansas City.
snippet: Ben Roethlisberger said he believed he could return this season despite spraining his right shoulder and sustaining what he called a dislocated rib in Monday night’s overtime win against Kansas City.
